column2: Number of displaced people by region, 2005?2014
Development Initiatives based on UNHCR data.

'Displaced persons' includes refugees and people in refugee-like situations, IDPs and asylum seekers. IDP numbers include only those persons protected/assisted by UNHCR. Data is organised according to UNHCR's definitions of country/territory of asylum. Countries are organised according to OECD DAC’s classification of regions.
